bullets:
Super Soft - Bamboo fiber is known for its softness. These super soft bamboo towels give you an experience of luxury & warmth.  
, Quick Absorbent: The internal hollow fiber structure of these towels make them 3 times more absorbent than the cotton towels available. These soft bamboo face towels are suitable for sweat & moisture absorption.  
, Odour free : Bamboo fiber has antibacterial properties which ensures the towels are odour free.  
, Skin protection -These towels are ideal for daily use as they have been strategically designed for everyone’s needs. Bamboo adds natural antimicrobial qualities; making our towels superior for sensitive skin and allergies. Because of these properties, they resist fungus, even in humid environments.  
, Multipurpose: Heelium’s Face towels can be used as a regular face towel, a yoga towel, a gym towel, etc
important_info: 1.These towels are machine washable with lukewarm water on delicate wash with like colors and thoroughly rinse. 2.Do not add bleach. 3.Tumble dry with no or low heat setting. 4.We do not recommend the use of fabric softeners as they tend to block the micro-gaps in the fibers leading to reduced absorbency.

aplus_text: After consulting many hair stylists, we have made Mush Bamboo hair wraps / Turban towels, which are good for hair compared to regular terry towels. If you’re looking to streamline your hair drying routine, now’s the perfect time to start with us !Mush Hair Towel is extremely lightweight which makes it easy to carry wherever you go! Perfect for routine hair wash, gym, traveling, beach excursions, sports, camping, water park, outdoors, home, hotels, pool parties and professional hair salon use.When hair is wet, it becomes much more vulnerable and prone to breakage than normal. Using a regular body towel can cause hair damage over time, it can further also increase the amount of frizz you encounter every day. That’s where a hair drying towel comes to your rescue- A hair towel wrap is specifically made to perfectly absorb all the extra moisture in your hair.Say goodbye to your hair dryers as Mush Hair towel is here to protect you from all the damage instigated by long term use of hair dryers.After washing your hair, wrap it in the towel and close it with the button. You can be sure that the hair towel will not be slipping off. Your head stays warm and comfortable as your hair dries.Our microfiber hair towel is made from bamboo that is extremely soft to the touch, super absorbent and fast drying. The advanced fabric absorbs more than 10 times its weight in water.Hair should be about 70% dry before you start going in with the blow-dryer. The longer your hair is exposed to the heat, the more damage is likely to occur. Less blow drying is better for the health and sheen of your hair.Ideal for home, travelling, spa, gym, hotel, saloons, beauty clinics, work from home and gifting.
bullets:
After bathing, twist into a headscarf like a normal towel, hook the loops on the buttons to fix them in place. The button helps it to use in two ways : either forward or backward side like a turban.  
, Mush Hair Towels are made out of 100% Bamboo fabric which makes it extremely soft, Absorbent, & Anti-odor. It reduces hair drying time to half !  
, Mush hair towel size is 25cms * 60cms, available in many colors : white, dark grey, baby pink, sky blue, light grey that can be selected according to your preferences.  
, This towel is extremely lightweight and comes in a fabric bag which makes it easy to carry wherever you go! Perfect for routine hair wash, gym, traveling, beach excursions, sports, camping, water park, outdoors, home, hotels, pool parties and professional hair salon use.  
, This towel helps you to minimize damage caused by water, blow dryers, cotton towels and even air drying, hair looks smoother and shinier. Hair is less frizzy & styles better and even your color lasts longer. Hands-free drying.
